results.name: Inverse permutation of A163357.
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65535
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
xref: Inverse: A163357. a(n) = A054239(A163356(n)). One-based version: A163362. See also A163334 and A163336.
